alert.note: Alert for Camden (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:15PM CDT until May 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Camden County in central Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laurie, or 9 miles northwest of Camdenton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Ha Ha Tonka State Park, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, Osage Beach, Camdenton, Sunrise Beach, Linn Creek, Green Bay Terrace, Hurricane Deck, Old Linn Creek, Barnumton, Decaturville, Purvis, Roach and Kaiser. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
